title: Silver/Gold members wanted for semi-serious/fun ranked 5's Team
body:
Hey guys,

Looking for Silver/Gold members who are looking for a semi--serious/fun team to play in.
Team is already Silver 3. We use Teamspeak 3 as voice chat so having that and a mic would be preferred.

Comment below or add Mr Tickles in game to talk to me.

Comment with:
IGN: 
Rank: 
Preferred lane: 
Main Champs:

replies.body:
add me: SeriousNUB
Im Gold 4 in NA, main Supp mid.
In Oce, im start rank and currently Silver 2, can play any role, best with supp any champ

IGN: TFK Shadow
Rank: Gold V
Preferred lane: Support/Adc 
Main Champs: Thresh, Tristana, Jinx, Janna

IGN Kaze Enigma
Rank: S2
Pref Lane: Bot or jung
Main Champs: Nami Nautilis Taric Sona currently relearning Soraka. Miss Fortune Tristana and Cait for adc. Jung champs Nunu Cho Xin Zhao Trundle Tryndamere Nautilis.

Have TS3.

IGN: SKT T1 Fakerer
Rank: S4, but my main is G4
Preferred lane: Mid
Main Champs: Zed, Azir, Nidalee, but i can play any mid laner well.

IGN: Mar3thyu
Rank: G5
Preferred lane: Jg, Top, Sup, Mid(pretty much anything but adc)
Main Champs: Don't really have a main I'm one of those people that can pick up a champ and just play them

I might be keen. 

Ign: Brucinator
Silver 4 atm. 
Always been a top lane but i have no issues with JG or mid other than having to expand my champ pool a bit.

Toplane i can play Fizz, Irelia, Jax, Mao'kai, Nasus, Ryze, Sion, Vlad. Still learning hecarim and rumble, but i probs wouldnt trust myself no to suck vs anyone that knows what they're doing.

Jg champs are mostly Fizz, Vi, Gragas, Skarner. Can also play Aatroxx, Mao'kai and sion, but not quite as good.

Mid lane's probs my worst role other than botlane, my champ pools pretty small. Basically fizz, xerath and orianna. I can play lost of other champs, just not as comfortably as those three. 

Anyways, add me if you want and we can have a few games and see if everyones happy with it.

I've got TS3 too, btw.
